name: OptionBuilder_hasOptionalArgTest
description: Tests for the hasOptionalArg functionality in OptionBuilder.

test_cases.name: testHasOptionalArg
test_cases.description: Tests the hasOptionalArg functionality of the OptionBuilder and verifies the properties of the created Option.

test_cases.name: testHasOptionalArgWithReset
test_cases.description: Tests the hasOptionalArg functionality of the OptionBuilder with a reset scenario and verifies the properties of the created Option.
